title: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: When attempting to add a new localization key, if the key is left blank in the properties file, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart's title.
OB: When a key is left blank in the properties file, but it has a valid value, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart title.
EB: The expected behavior is that if the key is left blank, it should still be possible to externalize the text in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Attempt to add a new localization key.
2. Leave the key blank in the properties file with a valid value.
3. Check that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
